name: Nintia Estate
description: Nintia Estate is an NFT Play-To-Earn game that aims to turn its players into Real Estate investors through renting, buying, selling and maintaining properties. All of this happens in Nintia, our beautiful country, which hosts 4 different cities, each one with its own features and life costs. It is built on Binance Smart Chain and is fully accessible to any type of player who wishes to invest.
